title: News24.com | 'In this together' - Meet the taxi operators at the forefront of fighting Covid-19
description: Usually the message from the taxi industry is preventing road deaths - but now its washing hands and preventing the spread of Covid-19.
content:
Members of the taxi industry joined gloved and sanitised hands on Monday to launch a Covid-19 awareness campaign in the Western Cape with a walkabout at the Cape Town taxi rank.
The campaign came at a time when the number of people testing positive for the c… [+7085 chars]
